public ref class Utilities abstract sealed

summary.span: Contém métodos de utilitário usados pelo MSBuild.

span.span: Contains utility methods used by MSBuild.

summary.span: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string unescapedExpression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (unescapedExpression As String) As String

param.name: unescapedExpression
param.span: A cadeia de caracteres a ser convertida.

summary.span: Converte a cadeia de caracteres especificada em uma sintaxe que permite que o mecanismo [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] interprete o caractere literalmente.

span.span: Converts the specified string into a syntax that allows the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to interpret the character literally.

returns.span: O valor convertido da cadeia de caracteres especificada.

span.span: The converted value of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Determinados caracteres têm significado especial em arquivos de projeto do [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].Certain characters have special meaning in [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project files. O ponto e vírgula (;) e o asterisco (\*) são exemplos de caracteres.Examples of the characters include semicolons (;) and asterisks (\*). Para usar os seguintes caracteres especiais como literais, eles devem ser especificados com o sintaxe % nn, onde nn representa o valor hexadecimal ASCII do caractere.In order to use these special characters as literals, they must be specified with the syntax %nn, where nn represents the ASCII hexadecimal value of the character. Esse método executa a conversão.This method performs that conversion.
